Package danogl.collisions.AABB

Class AABBPairCollisionHandler

java.lang.Object
danogl.collisions.AABB.AABBPairCollisionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
PairCollisionHandler
public class AABBPairCollisionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements PairCollisionHandler
Responsible for computing and caching the intersection data of two GameObjects whose colliders are AABBs (axis-aligned bounding-boxes). Is not responsible for resolving the collision.
Author:
Dan Nirel

    Assuming this CollisionHandler supports the given pair of GameObjects, the method computes the relevant data regarding their collision.

    • calcIntersectionRect

      public static java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Float calcIntersectionRect​(GameObject go1, GameObject go2, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Float rect1World, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Float rect2World)
      Calculates the intersection rect of two game objects.
      Parameters:
      go1 - game object 1
      go2 - game object 1
      rect1World - a container for the world space rect of game object 1. updated if supplied. can be null.
      rect2World - a container for the world space rect of game object 2. updated if supplied. can be null.
      Returns:
      the intersection rectangle. if null, no intersection occurs.
